1460532371959136265.text: My DevRel lesson for today: Preferably don't syndicate content when you're just back from leave, there's a chance the feature may have been outdated in all that time🤷🏼‍♀️🙊 https://t.co/HFW8ROKfDu

1460527861043847169.text: @technikhil314 @getpostman Hi @technikhil314, the gateway functionality that would sync changes isn't available atm. Apologies for sharing the outdated video 🙈  But if you have your stages already deployed for an API, it's possible to observe them in Postman -https://t.co/3bRJRv3stG

1460526457382342662.text: @getpostman My bad, this video is out of date, unfortunately. @getpostman no longer supports creating a gateway. It is however possible at the moment to be able to observe deployments from different stages. More here - https://t.co/3bRJRv3stG

1460154853863223297.text:
Sync your API schemas directly to the AWS, so you can design and collaborate on your APIs in @getpostman and then build and deploy in AWS. 

Here's the Items API I'm using, if you'd like to give it a try: 
https://t.co/ukO2lk4mws https://t.co/PQLjkyyKZ6

1458438512705826820.text: A little birdy (read:@jansche) came up with this idea! We have the cutest team ❤️ Here's some @getpostman love on your birthday @PetuniaGray and the source code 😛 https://t.co/xOA3YptqJK https://t.co/UZStRJLHwf

1458277286264786944.text: @phillipmai @getpostman Hey @phillipmai, the proxy itself isn’t a new feature. But being able to capture HTTPS traffic, organising the captured traffic and being able to save responses captured are some of the latest updates 😀

1458044264592523266.text:
Debug an application by capturing HTTPS traffic and creating a @getpostman collection that you can share! 

It captures responses too, so I could totally add scripting, generate documentation and whatnot 🥳
🎥 Watch the complete video here: https://t.co/E9sAaHH4vM https://t.co/M7yRZyyDwh

1450026531087020032.text: Peek into some collections I'm exploring 👀 https://t.co/C8VxZZRj53 and then it's your turn to share🥳 https://t.co/gerGIMDK79
